message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exclusive product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thanks for your interest in the product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, I'm afraid I'm not comfortable with $1800000. I can do $1900000, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that works for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm thinking of $1850000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1875000. That's the lowest I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm getting close to the price I'm comfortable with, Alice. I'm thinking of $1862500. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. I can do $1880000. That's as low as I'm willing to go. Let me know if this is the price you're looking for.
I appreciate your willingness to make one final concession, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking of $1871250. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?
